package.name: ip
package.author: Aurelien Bras
package.description: Display your public IP with :ip ( Linux only )
package.title: Public IP

manifest.author: Aurelien Bras
manifest.description: Display your public IP with :ip ( Linux only )
manifest.name: ip
manifest.title: Public IP

value.readme:
A simple package to detect and insert your public ip, need dig to work.

This package has been **tested only on Linux**.

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# ip package

matches:
  - trigger: ":ip"
    replace: "{{output}}"
    vars:
      - name: output
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: "echo -n $(dig @resolver1.opendns.com ANY myip.opendns.com +short)"
